title: El Malpais National Monument: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Cave permits available for selected park caves  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Cave permits available for selected park caves  FREE mandatory cave permits are now available to visit specific caves in El Malpais. Permits can be obtained at the El Malpais Visitor Center at I-40/Exit 85. more
